website_summaries.verdict: The size and durability of this mat make it the perfect way to prepare a large garden.
pros: Power cord is well hidden and doesn't obstruct use of the mat
Multi-layered mat is waterproof and easy to wipe clean
Seeds sprout 2 to 5 days earlier than usual with this mat
Large 48- x 20-inch mat doesn't use too much energy
cons: Power cord is on the shorter side

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reptile tubs, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Using this to heat a plastic tub housing a ball python. Just perfect! I use a proportional temperature controller to keep the heat mat at a proper temperature. What I like about this heat mat is the fact that it has an appropriate power density for reptile heating - meaning that it does not get too hot at room temp even w/o a thermostat (but please use one of course.) The size - the 10" x 20.5" - is great for a sizeable tub. A similar pet store heat pad would cost 3 or 4 times as much, and this one works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 6strings

customer_reviews.title: Jump Start Your Garden Plants
customer_reviews.text: These mats are perfect if you want to jump-start your plants. I ran a comparison between seeds started using this mat to an identical set of starter cups not on the mat. I saw full germination of the Mat warmed seeds in 2 to 4 days sooner. The seeds in the unwarmed cups germinated at a rate of 76% and took the 2 to 4 days longer. Leaving the seedlings on the mat produced 2nd real leaf sets 65% faster than the set not on the mat. The test I describe took place in Florida and not in some dark and frigid Northern hinterland where the ambient environment was inhospitable to new growth.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great germination!
customer_reviews.text: I started my entire garden from seeds this year for the first time. I used this heat mat along with a few grow lights in my closet and everything come out great. I kept the mat on 24 hours a day for two months with no issues or huge increase in my eletric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My house almost went up in flames
customer_reviews.text: After two days of use the heating pad melted and burnt a hole in my floor had I not smelled it my house would have caught on fire and put my family and pets at risk first time I’ve had an issue with these mats but first time I’ve ever purchased one this big my advice is save your money
customer_reviews.author: Blake collins

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for Gardeners with Late Frost Dates.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this same size mat on garden websites for close to $90. Bought two on amazon for less than one on those other sites and have been more than happy with them. I have seeds that for whatever reason have only a 50% germination rate and because I used the heat mats I got more than that. They are terrific for climates in the North where our latest frost date is mid May. My garden will have a good start because of the heat mats.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of one

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: I am a gardener in the northeast. Starting plants indoors months before I can plant them is a must. It's also necessary to keep the plants warm. This mat works as well as others I have that are 2 to 3 times the price. Definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Largest mat does not heat well for seed germination
customer_reviews.text: Largest mat does not heat well or uniformly. The mat is a large rectangle and the heating element runs in an s shape throughout the mat. The heating element heats in the area where the heating element is and an inch or inch and a half to either side which leaves a gap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dubia Roach Colony. A must have!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the perfect, low-energy solution to keep your container with Dubia Roaches at the right temperature, this is it. Cost effective and works like a charm. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get seedlings started for my garden. Unlike other seedling heat mats I've used, this one is thick, not thin & flat, but it evens out somewhat once it was unrolled for a day or two. It's nice & big, which was the reason I got it, but the heat it generates is really uneven throughout the mat, much colder on the edges, with a definite hot spot in the middle, with difference of 10+ degrees f around the mat. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adri J

customer_reviews.title: One-temperature-fits-all
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential product for efficiently starting one's seedlings. It's well made and other than placing seedling cups on the mat, it takes no wear. Still, it seems to be made of very durable vinyl or similar material and water seeping through the plant soil is not a problem. One unfortunate design may be the fact that it has only one temperature. I'm not sure if a varied control would make any difference, but I do know that some seeds (like okra) need warmer soil than others (like cabbage). But so far, I have had no problem in starting any seeds. So I'm not grousing about the design, just so you know it's a one-temperature-fits-all product.
customer_reviews.author: Guthrie McIllhennon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend this particular brand
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective, where the edges should be sealed it was not sealed properly The side was gaping open. which would allow moisture to get inside with the element also the plastic was extremely stiff and did not seem like it would unroll very well. I am returning and I’ve already purchased another brand which seems to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: One season and done unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: These did great the first season last year. Used inside my house on a metal rack I set up for seedling starts. After the seedlings all were stable/ concluded I put the mats back in their box and stored in my master closet. This week I went to repeat my set up and I cannot get my 2 mats to heat up. I tried different outlets and no dice. It’s unfortunate because these aren’t cheap, and they truly did an amazing job last year. But either I got a defective set or the longevity isn’t there.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good for seedlings.  Not good for pet cage.
customer_reviews.text: This mat may be perfect for seedlings, but I bought it based on an Amazon search for heating for a hermit crab tank. It does not get warm enough to heat the tank to the appropriate temperature. I am still using it along with another heat source. I have no worries about it becoming too hot and catching fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, basic mat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use basic heating mat with no temperature control (it's always on when plugged in). The temperature will fluctuate based on the temp of the room and environment but it will always be putting out some heat. I've used it to germinate several hundred seeds this past month with no problems and use it for tender transplants for a day or two until they adjust. Don't overthink it for general germination. Just plug it in, place your containers with seeds on it and let it do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: V. Sieber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to heat the underside of my fish bowls when I have them in their small separation tank for medicating or for temporary holds for tropical fish. All thicknesses of glass and amount of water must be considered for your fish if you are to use this product to heat your small temporary aquarium. Do not try this unless you are *babysitting an accurate water thermometer for a 12 hour period*. Be responsible, this product is not designed for animals so it is at your own risk. However, it works great for my needs during this harsh winter. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good to help regulate soil for seedlings.  I am gladigotit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for planting seedlings. Very good. My seedlings surfaced in less than a week.i got the thermostat to regulate heat but can use without if you have a beverage thermometer such as one for making milk froth for coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Pat 941B

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT raise temperature enough
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to help germinate seeds. The mat does get slightly warmer after 30 MINUTES or so, but nothing that would significantly increase the temperature of anything placed on top. Barely feel any difference when putting my hand on the mat. My seeds were in a wet paper towel, on a paper plate, on this mat. That's one layer of paper towel and paper plate between the seeds and the mat. VERY LITTLE heat difference on the seeds. I'd be better off putting them on top of gaming console or tube tv. Lot's of time and effort trying to grow these stunted plants now thanks to this garbage purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary L Stark

customer_reviews.title: Maybe user error?
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time having a seedling heating mat. however, it seemed much too hot, and kept my soil well above 85 degrees most of the time. at one point, I folded it over on itself to heat only some of my many seedlings. This resulted in the rubber melting and exposing the wires. Glad it didn't burn down my house, yikes!
customer_reviews.author: B. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Rocket start seedlings
customer_reviews.text: Seed starts shoot up like crazy. Careful to get your cool weather enjoying plants off of it quickly though so they don't get leggy (lettuce, accidentally left on it went from 1/2" tall to 1" tall overnight) Started most of my garden on them and was very pleased with the results. Does seem to be a touch warmer in a few spots, but the trays/dirt evens that out. If your starts are in very shallow dirt, that could be an issue with more-sensitive plants.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love these and so do my plants
customer_reviews.text: I love these and so do my plants. I start them in the basement but it's chilly down there. These mats give just the right amount of heat to keep them warm under the grow lights.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had never used one of these before and man what a difference. Almost all of our seeds for our garden sprouted quickly and our tomatoes and peppers seemed to especially like the warm soil this creates. I highly recommend it and recommend getting the temp control as well so it doesn't get the soil too warm during the day.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had other sizes. :\
customer_reviews.text: I have bought both the 10×20 and 20×48, and they both work great. I've never had the slightest issue with either of them. I love growing all sorts of things; from fruits and veggies in the outdoor garden, to houseplants and terrarium plants indoors. I use these bad boys to help me start seeds year-round. ;) My only complaint is that I wish they made these mats in some different sizes. Your standard choices seem to be the small square one, small rectangular one, or the gargantuan monster mat. Nothing in between, even from other brands. I'd really love to see, say, a 15"×38". (Or something.)
customer_reviews.author: Kayami

customer_reviews.title: Great working heat mat for up to four (4) full sized flats
customer_reviews.text: I set this up on a table in our sunroom... and placed four (4) full sized flats on it. My tomato and pepper seeds are flourishing in their flats (under domes) I'm hoping this mat lasts for years. (this was my first year of use) I don't have an exact temperature measurement but I'm guessing this increases the temperature by at least 10 degrees...
customer_reviews.author: E. Amanda Lants

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for seed starts!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. Very easy to use (just plug it in.) My only complaint if any, is there is only the one temperature. To use it for other seedlings, I double case my plants that prefer a cooler start to decrease the soil temp. My next mats will be those with temp control. (These have none)
customer_reviews.author: The realskinny

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: bought in jan 25 2019 trying to use for fall cabbage ain't getting very hot ,seeds slow about germanating are they warrtany
customer_reviews.author: catfish

customer_reviews.title: My first time growing plants indoors - works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I purchased this, it is durable and works well starting seedlings indoors in Minnesota. I also purchased a temperature thermometer to regulate the heat, but ultimately didn't need/use it because this heat pad doesn't overheat. The large size accommodated three large seed starter trays. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable temp control
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and seems very durable and reliable. I have purchased many mats like this in the last 20 years, so I’m at much higher prices with much less accurate temperature control and electronics. Remember this can only raise the ambient temperature about 10° at most, so set your expectations correctly
customer_reviews.author: JeffKnowsStuff

customer_reviews.title: Missing a power button
customer_reviews.text: It could have a power button inline with the power cord so that I won’t have to unplug it every time I want to power off.
customer_reviews.author: careyou

customer_reviews.title: Made to look like my expensive heavy duty heat mats
customer_reviews.text: Made to look like my expensive heavy duty heat mats. The material that wraps the heating elements is a medium weight plastic. Not quite as nice as theore expensive ones. I doubt it will hold up for the 6+ Years I’ve had my others. But honestly it works very well. Will see how it holds up over the next several weeks of dozens of trays being moved on and off of it. Seems like it will work. Price point was fantastic for sure.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I only gave Three Stars for Temp Control because you cannot control the temp - but it is very stable on its own. I only wish there was a control for the user to adjust. However, I have that about three yrs and it is still going strong - - Just Like Day One
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for vegetables started from seeds. I believe it did help facilitate the growth of the seeds by keeping them warm. It doesn’t get too hot so it’s not a hazard but it keeps them warm all the time. It is a good size for multiple plants. Easy to use just plug it in!
customer_reviews.author: CAITLIN

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Our plants love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for starter plants to really get them going in preparation to put them out in your garden. This is so helpful as our growing season in Nevada is short. The plants seem to grow much faster than without the heating pad. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Terrillion

customer_reviews.title: The quality feels very good and the plastic is thick
customer_reviews.text: This heat mat is as described. I'm using it during the winter to keep the porch plants a bit warmer. In another couple months it will be used to start seeds. The quality feels very good and the plastic is thick. It's a bit unnerving to keep something running all the time that's direct AC powered, but it is rugged enough that I'm not concerned about issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kranyec

customer_reviews.title: Great foot warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I put this under the area rug in front of my couch and connected it to a lamp dimmer ( Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good heat source
customer_reviews.text: This does not get warm at all. It comes on, but the warmth of it can be compared to microwaving something for 10 seconds and letting it cool for a minute. My window seal is warmer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for seedlings!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat to start seedlings for my garden this year. The mat is well made, heavy and substantial, and waterproof. My seedlings all sprouted in three to four days. When I was done with the mat for each batch of seedlings, I wiped it down with a damp cloth, rolled it up and stored it until I needed it again. I will definitely purchase more of these mats when I expand my seedling operation.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: We use this product to germinate seeds and have been successful with our seeds. Only downfall is that we have no control over temperature as in only one setting so plants requiring more heat are very slow in germinating
customer_reviews.author: Itzy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these mats currently and love them immensely. With a thermostat they are perfect for use under my reptile and insect bins. In a couple of the setups they mats can even be used in direct contact with lizards without burning them.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby crickets. And it works very well for what I needed it for. I have it taped to a tote as it doesn't have sticky back. Would be awesome if they made that a feature. because even if I used for plants I would think I'd need to attach it somehow
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Will it Last?
customer_reviews.text: Not plugged-in yet; should be starting seeds by 1 March. Have used comparable mats in the past. They have survived from one year to three years; hope this one lasts at least three years. Considering an average life expectancy of at least three years, I would not spend more than $35-$40 for a 2X4 mat.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Good for providing heat for feeder insects
customer_reviews.text: I got these to provide heat for my dubia and laterallis roaches. It's been plugged in 24h a day for half a month now with no problem. The heated areas of the mat stays around 90 - 95 F and my roaches seem to like it. However, not all the surface areas produce heat, certain edges will stay room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jidanmei Ran

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We can't believe the boost for starting many seeds. It was exciting to see germination in the second day. This really lives up to the reputation. Would by 2 smaller ones rather than 1 larger mat because of different germination rates the faster sprouting seeds could be moved off the mat when no longer needed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Kefir Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great little warming pad. We use it for kefir and sourdough, and it does the job. We keep our house in the 60s in the winter, so this helps the cultures flourish. Gentle heat, just warm to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price if you don't mind the lack of control
customer_reviews.text: My pepper seeds would not sprout because it was too cold. Since I got this heating mat, my habanero and shishito peppers all came out and are doing well. The temperature seems fine but you don't get a thermostat so no way to control it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great heating mat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time this season works well.Appears to be well constructed and should last for many seasons. Time will tell only bug is doesn't lay exactly flat until trays are on it.Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Giovanelli

customer_reviews.title: Useful heated mat for kefir
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mat to use when I started making water kefir. My house is on the cool side so I hoped this would work and it did. The grains responded well to the heated mat and I was pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Good temperature
customer_reviews.text: This kept my seedlings at an optimal temperature. I had must faster germination using it this year than prior years. Would recommend covering seed trays with plastic because it will make them evaporate faster.
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: High quality, large ..consistent heat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to start seedlings on ..kept a consistent temp and was large enough to cover the entire shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Priced nice
customer_reviews.text: My orchids are enjoying the warmth and the mat was way bigger then I expected. Which is great. I can get a couple more orchids on the mat
customer_reviews.author: Maria S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that performs exactly as advertised. I would recommend this item to anybody that starts seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth at least twice what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product hands down I made sure to get this one because it was 100 watt v.s. 16 watt for similar product, so good in fact I needed to purchase a affordable temperature control because it gets really warm and it covers a large surface area and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Huge Warming Mat.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have a temperature control but this is common with all the competing brands. Need to buy a temperature controller because I don’t need as much heat as they provide. Overall, item was as described and is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Heats those Plants Up
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these things are necessary for timely and healthy germination of tender plants: tomatoes, peppers, etc. I put this mat inside a grow tent, it can easily get the soil up to the upper 70sF even when the grow light is off, when the grow light is on the soil temps can go into the 80s. With this warm starting mix plants germinate in only a few days, and grow rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V

customer_reviews.title: I got this second mat as was satisfied the first set (mat with thermostat)
customer_reviews.text: I got this second mat as was satisfied the first set (mat with thermostat). As the thermostat can handle up to 1000 watts, I got this second one to work in parallel with the first set. Used this to germinate Reaper, Chocolate Douglah 7 Pot, and Ghost successfully in 2 weeks. Will recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This larger size heat mats fit the table I am using for seed starting perfectly.i just got it set up recently,but so far so good.It is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!!!! BEST PRICE AROUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: Price and Value can't be beat, easily holds 4 standard 1020 flats. Bought 2 for indoor garden starts and they are a no-brainer for anyone thinking of getting started with indoor germination.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: perfect for starting seeds in cold environments
customer_reviews.text: I could fit 4 trays 10x20. With lids on it was 74 degrees. The ambient room temperature was 57 degrees. To prevent the seedlings from getting direct heat. I put cardboard wrapped in aluminum foil under the trays. Most of the seeds germinated 3-4 days earlier than the seed packets stated. Very happy with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Propagation Mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Propagation Mat! Cuttings from fruit trees were rooting in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Preston R. Savell

customer_reviews.title: Fast Sprouting!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped germination. Be prepared, thyy speed it up so much that I didn't catch it and my spouts got leggy. Thats my fault, but be aware. These things work great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Jack in the Beanstalk would be envious!
customer_reviews.text: These seedling heat mats work absolutely great. Give your plants a head start, but plan ahead when you need to transplant your seedlings. These mats really supercharge the growth of seeds. Jack would be impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seedling mat that works great and is efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This heat mat works extremely well. Almost to well! I had to use a buffer (humidome) between my pots and mat. It fits under a 1020 tray just right and uses 17.5 Watts so it’s extremely efficient. If it goes out quickly for some reason I will post an update
customer_reviews.author: WillyJayTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Great size, Uneven heating
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for seedlings except that the one I receieved heated unevenly, with the heat in the center and not towards the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Yam Mareka

customer_reviews.title: Will not heat above 10 degrees higher than ambient temp even with thermostat override!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with their ipower thermostat so I could override the temp to 95 degrees F. It did not make any difference using the thermostat. This mat will not get more than 10 degrees warmer than the air temp around it. Useless. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: MONITOR DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The monitor doesn’t work at all. Using all the “tricks” and trouble shooting guides for what to do if your monitor doesn’t detect a heart rate (which must happen with some frequncy since there’s a trouble shooting guide for it in the manual) was to no avail. It doesn’t work at all. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, huge mat
customer_reviews.text: This is huge I can put 3, maybe 4 seed trays on it. Already my beans are sprouting a d they were o ly planted a few days ago. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JEAN M. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Very little heat output
customer_reviews.text: The size is what I needed but the heat output is almost none!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: It’s got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This has been great; my only issue with is that the plastic separated a little on one of the edges. A little tape seemed to work.
customer_reviews.author: MarkRoyal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for starting seeds.
customer_reviews.text: We've always had trouble getting pepper seeds of any variety to germinate. They need warm soil for a couple of weeks. This is what you need to keep that soil warm! Pepper germination (and all others) is easier now!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great size for price
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price. It heats well to keep that added heat for seedlings. It is strong and holds up to normal wear and use. I will purchase another for the fall season and next year.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my small betta tank at abt 72 degrees, not so good for a betta, but should be great for seedlings
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lizards love it
customer_reviews.text: My little lizards love this thing. Had no problems with it overheating
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Defective and burnt my light light up too
customer_reviews.text: Plug this heat mat into power strip and plugged in my grow light. Come back light out, and the mat almost too hot to touch, change bulbs and still no light, grab a new light plugged it in and i heard it pop light went dead and start smoking
customer_reviews.author: nylocalwoods

customer_reviews.title: Great seed starter helper
customer_reviews.text: Great product really helps those seeds sprout faster. I used it with my dome seed starter and it keeps the water warm to give the seeds that heat they need to sprout
customer_reviews.author: isaac lujan

customer_reviews.title: It works okay
customer_reviews.text: I would have really liked this if it had heat settings.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: Warms 4 10x20 trays
customer_reviews.text: Temp in my seed starting area is 59-64 degrees F and this heat mat has raised the temp inside the seed starting trays to 80-85 degrees. Well worth the purchase price when compared with purchasing individual 10x20 mats. I WILL be buying these for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Green

customer_reviews.title: works but does not come with a control knob
customer_reviews.text: I use it for growing flowers and vegetables. The picture shows a control knob. I would like a way to know how hot it is. And to be able to set it on low if I want to.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great quality
customer_reviews.text: This excellent heat mat made my first attempt at seed starting a success! Heat seems very even. This was also the best value I could find, compared to places like Lowe’s and Menards.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Jay Stratton III

customer_reviews.title: Please with the heating pad
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my granddaughter's gecko it keeps the tank at room temperature
customer_reviews.author: CarolynO.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice-started using after I got it to keep a tray of micro greens warm while sprouting. This has escellerated the sprouts.. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ELO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product Great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great price point. One mat covers a whole shelf on my wire shelf unit and the seedlings love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela I Greene

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s as advertised but wish I’d bout the the unit with the thermostat. This thing will get pretty toasty!
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Sprouted 180 seedlings for the garden with a timer and a light.
customer_reviews.author: preybird1

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I grow my own bedding plants. It is so easy! The seed starting mats gives you a sturdy plant for your garden! I get better seed germination!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! bought it for brewing kombucha, it maintains a perfect temp!
customer_reviews.author: erik clausen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This map works exactly how it is described and has done a wonderful job with my seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: bsjhaley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Next year plants works great love it and have been telling our friends it's well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Doug merrill

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my husband's birthday during the 5 weeks of snow we had in the NW. His is an avid gardener and was upset that he couldn't start his seed in February as he normally does. Best birthday present I ever bought for him.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: The heat they put out is very good. My seeds can up in 3 - 5 days not the normal 7-12 days. The dirt is warm like in the summer. Only negative is the electric bill is about $30 more a month with using these I did purchase 3.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. My plants survived on a brisk morning and no damage!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hagel

customer_reviews.title: Plants... and more!
customer_reviews.text: We use this mat to keep our Betta fish warm in the winter. We put his bowl on top and it keeps his water at a good temperature.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Warms soil but not too hot. Appears that it will function for seasons to come. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Either way too hot or not hot enough with temp monitor dial. Using for snake. Decent.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: good starter for my seeds
customer_reviews.text: It let me start my seeds a month early and was simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Henderson

customer_reviews.title: very nice, performing well for keeping the bottom of my ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice, performing well for keeping the bottom of my fig cuttings warm. Cool tops warm bottoms = roots in 10 days, nice.
customer_reviews.author: PelletPuncher

customer_reviews.title: germination was accelerated.
customer_reviews.text: Germination was accelerated almost half the time it took at room temp
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL MAT FOR PEPPERS AND TOMATOES
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Helped germinate our tomatoes and peppers like a breeze! So thankful I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L. Schjott

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mat. Larger than I needed. Seedling growth was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what I ordered. Keeps the plants ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I ordered. Keeps the plants and air warm. Have seen more growth and flowers this winter than I have ever had. Looking forward to order more for seedlings and young plants.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is made of high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I'm presently using this item to start my vegetable seeds to germinate faster for my garden. It is really working too! My loose leaf lettuce has already germinated and only planted them two days ago! WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Purple Globe Acres Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works good but gets a little too warm, you can get a controller to cool it down a bit or put a towel between the mat and your tray like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Moosedogno

product_meta.title: iPower Durable Waterproof Seedling Heat Mat 48" x 20" Warm Hydroponic Heating Pad
product_meta.description:
Size:48" x 20" Heat Mat

 The iPower is engineered for better performance and greater durability. The new, stronger heating wire and thicker multi-layer construction offers more uniform heating and the durability to withstand rugged greenhouse environments.

This seedling heat mat will increase the success of seedlings and cuttings, and will warm the root area 10-20°F over ambient temperature to improve germination. Perfect for seeding, germination, home-brewing, and pet enclosures terrariums, such as those used in reptile, rodent and arachnid.

 48" x 20" heat mat; Fits under one common seed flat
 Gently warms root area to improve germination
 Increases success of seedlings and cuttings
 Warms root area 10-20°F over ambient temperature to improve germination
 Provides constant temperature to improve vegetable, plant, herb, and flower seed germination.
 Waterproof design allows for you to scrub and easier cleaning
 Durable, internal insulated wiring for enhanced safety
 Heavy duty multi-layer construction
 Length of Power Cord: 5.90ft
 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty
 Entire seedling heat mat MET listed, ETL listed seedling heat mat cord
 Specifications: 10"x 20.5": 17.5W +/-2W; 20"x 20": 45W +/-5W; 48"x 20": 100W +/-10W

About iPower:

 iPower is one of the Leading Professional Suppliers Over a Decade.
 Our goal is to put our best products in every home&garden where needed.
 We provide the premium quality components and reliable service.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: Internal insulated wiring for enhanced safety. Heavy duty multi-layer construction, water-resistance that enables safe scrubbing
PROFESSIONAL RELIABILITY: Warms 10-20°F above ambient room temperature. Provides constant temperature to improve vegetable, plant, herb, and flower seed germination
VARIETY OF USES: Perfect for seeding, germination, homebrewing, and pet enclosures terrariums, such as those used in reptile, rodent and arachnid
DIMENSIONS: 10"x 20.5", Watt: 17.5W; 20"x 20", Watt: 48W; 48"x 20", Watt: 100W; Length of Power Cord: 5.90ft
